scripts.[run local keycloak]: iam: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo $BRANCH | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' ); docker run -d --name iam-01__$BRANCH --restart unless-stopped -p 9090:8080 -e KC_BOOTSTRAP_ADMIN_USERNAME=admin -e KC_BOOTSTRAP_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin -v ./keycloak/dev-data/:/opt/keycloak/data/import/ quay.io/keycloak/keycloak:26.3.2 start-dev --import-realm
scripts.[remove local keycloak]: iam: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo $BRANCH | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' ); docker rm iam-01__$BRANCH -f -v
scripts.[run local db in docker]: cv-db: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo $BRANCH | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' ); (docker run -d --name cv-db-01__$BRANCH --restart unless-stopped -e POSTGRES_DB=mucv -e POSTGRES_USER=mucv-su -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD='mucv-Pa$$w0rd' -e PGDATA=/var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata -v "$PWD/temp:/var/lib/postgresql/data" -p 5433:5432 postgres:16-bookworm)
scripts.[stop local db in docker]: cv-db: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo $BRANCH | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' ); docker stop --name cv-db-01__$BRANCH
scripts.[remove local db in docker]: cv-db: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo $BRANCH | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' ); (docker rm --name cv-db-01__$BRANCH); rm -r "$PWD/temp/pgdata"
scripts.[build local image]: cv-api: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo $BRANCH | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' ); docker build ./Resume -f Resume/CV/MU.CV.API/Dockerfile.local -t mu/cv-api:local__$BRANCH
scripts.up dev in docker: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo "$BRANCH" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | tr '/' '-'); COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=rs-back__$BRANCH docker-compose -f docker-compose.local.yaml up -d
scripts.down dev from docker: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo "$BRANCH" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | tr '/' '-'); COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=rs-back__$BRANCH docker-compose -f docker-compose.local.yaml down
